    • calculateInfluence

      public Color calculateInfluence(boolean avoid_tower, Color avoid_color) throws EriantysException
      calculate an island's influence
      Parameters:
      avoid_tower - if true, don't count the towers
      avoid_color - if not null, don't count the student of this color
      Returns:
      the influence color (tower)
      Throws:
      EriantysException - error
